SignInPage.title: Welcome Back!
SignInPage.subtitle: Sign in to access your personalized healthcare assistant.

SignUpPage.title: Join us today!
SignUpPage.subtitle: Create your account to start your healthcare journey.

fields.privacyPolicyText: By clicking sign up, you agree to our

ChatsPage.initialMessage: Hi, I’m Aiden, answering all your vaccine questions! How can we help? If you don’t think the response is accurate or up to standards, let us know!

refer.title: Refer a Friend
refer.description: Know someone who could benefit from VaxSupport? Spread the word and share it with them!

feedback.title: Submit feedback
feedback.description: Was there a response that wasn’t helpful or transparent enough? Tell us about it!

enhancements.title: Enhancements
enhancements.description: Is there a feature you’d like to see built to support vaccine decisions?

ResetPasswordConfirmationModal.title: Reset user password
ResetPasswordConfirmationModal.message: Are you sure you want to reset this user's password? This action is irreversible.

ProfilePage.profileDescription: View and edit your profile information.
ProfilePage.myReportsDescription: Issues reported by you along with their current status.
ProfilePage.deleteAccountDescription: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.

LegalNoticeModal.title: Legal Notice
LegalNoticeModal.notice: This platform is not a substitute for patient-provider decision making. By clicking Accept, you understand that responses are intended to be informative, are AI-based, and should get more precise over time.

DeleteReportConfirmationModal.title: Delete report
DeleteReportConfirmationModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this report? This action is irreversible.

DeleteAccountConfirmationModal.title: Delete account
DeleteAccountConfirmationModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your account and all the related data? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.

DeleteUserConfirmationModal.title: Delete user
DeleteUserConfirmationModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete this user's account and all the related data? Once the account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted.
